alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Eastern Ascension; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa; Southern Livingston; Southwestern St. Tammany; St. Helena (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 4:47PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Ascension, southeastern St. Helena, Livingston and southern Tangipahoa Parishes through 515 PM CDT... At 446 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Whitehall to near Springfield to near Ponchatoula to 8 miles southwest of Madisonville to 16 miles west of Lacombe. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Amite, Ponchatoula, Walker, Amite City, Livingston, Independence, Albany, Springfield, Montpelier, Natalbany, Robert, Whitehall, Killian and Tickfaw. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 17 and 51. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 17 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Eastern Ascension; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa; Southern Livingston; Southwestern St. Tammany; St. Helena
